name: The Food Packaging Forum Foundation
goal:
The Food Packaging Forum communicates high-quality scientific information, is balanced and independent, and enables consumer self-determination by providing the facts on aspects pertaining to food packaging and health, with a focus on chemical composition of food contact materials, migration and chronic exposure to mixtures of food contact substances at low levels. It addresses all its stakeholders: business decision makers, regulators, media and communication experts, consumers, and scientists.

The Food Packaging Forum enables a stakeholder dialogue on the issue of healthy food packaging.
interests: Communication, Consumers, Education and training, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: We are interested in chemicals policy in general and food contact policies in particular. The nature of our organization is not to advocate or influence policy making.
